{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3431589,"name":"saran wagner","username":"fuzzyrobots","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fuzzyrobots/{size}/233820_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T18:18:14.740Z","cooked":"

Hi! I had the idea of attaching a speaker on the robot that can play music in between matches to hype everyone up. I only found threads from 8 years ago saying that as long as it‚Äôs not distracting during matches it‚Äôs totally okay. So as long as it doesn‚Äôt play at all during matches, are speakers still okay?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T18:18:14.740Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":41,"reads":691,"readers_count":690,"score":348.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"saran wagner","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":67007,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"10021 alum"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/1","custom_user_title":"10021 alum","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3431592,"name":"Jim Sokoloff","username":"sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T18:21:08.232Z","cooked":"

R203 addresses this.

speakers, sirens, air horns, or other audio devices that generate sound at a level sufficient to be a distraction

I would conclude that so long as the sound is not at such a level, that you are OK.

I do not conclude that sound above such a level is OK so long as it‚Äôs not during a match. This rule is a general robot construction rule [meaning it applies all the time, not just during matches].

Edit to add: Anything that would be loud enough to ‚Äúhype everyone up‚Äù at an event would almost certainly be correctly judged to be ‚Äúsound at a level sufficient to be a distraction‚Äù

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T18:46:18.969Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":689,"readers_count":688,"score":237.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"Jim Sokoloff","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frctools.com/2024/rule/R203","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"R203","clicks":6}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66298,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"97 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/2","custom_user_title":"97 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431601,"name":"EricH","username":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T18:39:34.661Z","cooked":"

Also, be warned: Speakers on the robots are likely to stop working for unexplained reasons, probably related to all the sudden shock loading when slamming into the field or other robots during matches.

And before you say ‚Äúwell, maybe I should put it on the cart instead‚Äù, I point out E604.

You may be better off using headphones, just take them OFF before you go onto the field.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T18:39:34.661Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":631,"readers_count":630,"score":166.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"EricH","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frctools.com/2024/rule/E604","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"E604","clicks":54}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":4212,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"#westandwithUkraine"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/3","custom_user_title":"#westandwithUkraine","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431618,"name":"Yishai Levy","username":"levyishai","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/levyishai/{size}/264719_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T19:11:45.385Z","cooked":"
Phoenix 6

Orchestra

Compatible motors powered by Talon FX have the ability to produce audible output through the MusicTone( Java, C++, Python) control request. The Orchestra API extends this ability and orchestrates m...

Just saying

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T19:11:45.385Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":548,"readers_count":547,"score":399.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"Yishai Levy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://v6.docs.ctr-electronics.com/en/stable/docs/api-reference/api-usage/orchestra.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Orchestra","clicks":27}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":19}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57809,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team Captain, Programming Lead & Operator"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/4","custom_user_title":"Team Captain, Programming Lead & Operator","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":15},{"id":"call_me_hand","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":19,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431622,"name":"saran wagner","username":"fuzzyrobots","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fuzzyrobots/{size}/233820_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T19:40:56.773Z","cooked":"

By ‚Äúhype everyone up‚Äù I meant people in a general shorter vicinity of the robot which would mainly be fellow team members, not going to blast anything super loud as per R203, thank you for the clarification!

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T19:40:56.773Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":473,"readers_count":472,"score":94.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"saran wagner","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":66298,"username":"sokoloff","name":"Jim Sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":67007,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"10021 alum"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/5","custom_user_title":"10021 alum","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431624,"name":"saran wagner","username":"fuzzyrobots","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fuzzyrobots/{size}/233820_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T19:44:09.981Z","cooked":"

Thank you! I‚Äôm thinking of having a clip-on attachment able to hold the average handheld Bluetooth speaker and take the speakers off before matches my team could also just save it for outreach events worst case. Would just limited speaker use to outreach events be a better idea?

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T19:44:09.981Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":446,"readers_count":445,"score":89.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"saran wagner","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":4212,"username":"EricH","name":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":67007,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"10021 alum"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/6","custom_user_title":"10021 alum","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431626,"name":"Jim Sokoloff","username":"sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T19:48:18.675Z","cooked":"

If you are asked, I would think through the answer to the question ‚Äúis that part of the robot or part of the cart?‚Äù (And I‚Äôd probably answer ‚Äúit‚Äôs part of the Operator Console‚Äù or ‚Äúit‚Äôs part of our technician‚Äôs tools for robot setup‚Äù.)

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T19:48:18.675Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":408,"readers_count":407,"score":86.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"Jim Sokoloff","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66298,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"97 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/7","custom_user_title":"97 Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431629,"name":"FrankJ","username":"FrankJ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/frankj/{size}/5392_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T19:53:30.155Z","cooked":"

speakers going the field would have the be inspected with the robot. You would not be allowed to take them off once on the field. wireless (bluetooth) speakers would (should) not pass inspection.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T19:53:30.155Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":376,"readers_count":375,"score":135.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"FrankJ","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":66298,"username":"sokoloff","name":"Jim Sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":15944,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2974 Robot Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/8","custom_user_title":"2974 Robot Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"100","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431639,"name":"Jim Sokoloff","username":"sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T20:05:11.582Z","cooked":"

Correct; G302 blocks the use of wireless speakers as proposed. Wired speakers could (as far as I read the rules) be brought to the ARENA as part of the OPERATOR CONSOLE (edit to add for clarity: or as a permanent part of the ROBOT).

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T20:18:00.871Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":348,"readers_count":347,"score":74.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"Jim Sokoloff","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frctools.com/2024/rule/G302","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"G302","clicks":2}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":15944,"username":"FrankJ","name":"FrankJ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/frankj/{size}/5392_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66298,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"97 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/9","custom_user_title":"97 Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431650,"name":"Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)","username":"ngreen","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ngreen/{size}/264478_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T20:48:38.321Z","cooked":"

I figure that a majority of operator consoles (laptops) have wired speakers. Maybe just throw a hype video on it and call it a day.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T20:48:59.324Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":317,"readers_count":316,"score":63.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":66298,"username":"sokoloff","name":"Jim Sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":2695,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/10","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431658,"name":"Joshua","username":"JoshuaJ1710","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/joshuaj1710/{size}/206763_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T21:13:04.669Z","cooked":"

Our robot plays Danger Zone upon startup. Branding must stay consistent

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T21:13:15.192Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":282,"readers_count":281,"score":71.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"Joshua","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":57809,"username":"levyishai","name":"Yishai Levy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/levyishai/{size}/264719_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53736,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Design Lead (CDO) | Drive Coach"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/11","custom_user_title":"Design Lead (CDO) | Drive Coach","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3431659,"name":"Andrew Lawrence","username":"Andrew_L","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andrew_l/{size}/270442_2.png","created_at":"2024-10-06T21:17:29.360Z","cooked":"

Yes, but only if they play Technotronic‚Äôs 1989 Belgian techno anthem ‚ÄúPump Up The Jam‚Äù.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2024-10-06T21:17:29.360Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":274,"readers_count":273,"score":179.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":472468,"topic_slug":"are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots","display_username":"Andrew Lawrence","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":8}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28413,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Yo! Champ in the making!"},"post_url":"/t/are-speakers-still-legal-on-robots/472468/12","custom_user_title":"Yo! I thought it was 2 Unlimited‚Äôs Get Ready For This. But multiple songs off of Jock Jams Vol. 1 would qualify. Though personally House of Pain‚Äôs Jump Around on Vol. 4 is my choice.

If I may be a curmudgeon. Imagine you are trying to troubleshoot, program new autonomous, or answering judges questions‚Ä¶ and the pits next door starts playing music that will ‚Äúhype everyone up‚Äù. Not everyone around might appreciate it. I love music, but remember your neighbors may not appreciate, the distraction.

First off, that speaker is a really cool idea! We have traditionally done it with LED strips, but we have also been talking about using a PI screen for on board diagnostics. Also, the REV digit board works well too Digit MXP Display - REV Robotics

I was thinking about this yesterday, is there a way to add a noise generating method to get human player attention. I don‚Äôt know of a legal way, as if it‚Äôs a distraction to catch the human players attention, it‚Äôs probably a distraction for the opposing drive teams too. (Although some of the slams on the back loading station in 2023 were just as distracting)

I know the Bees have a flash leds crazy mode for this, I just thought acoustic might be better. (I guess I can just keep being a loud drive coach too, the human players and opposing drive coaches say they hear me on occasion)

It was pretty quiet in match I could hear it if I was looking out for it, it was no way loud enough to get a human players attention. It was pretty much used for debugging in the pit and preloading correctly from what I observed.

They had LED bars for driver feedback while the match was running.

Independent of the rules issues, if you want tunes while waiting in the queue or working in the pit or behind the glass, why would you choose to put the weight and electrical drain of the sound system on the robot when it can be on the cart or driver station?
